mapper.insert:
select seq_goods.nextval from dual
insert into goods (goods_num, mem_num_sell, name, detail, price, cnt, trade_method_code, input_date, category_num, location, quality_code, sell_status_code) values (#{goodsNum}, #{memNum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title}, #{detail}, #{price}, #{cnt}, #{tradeMethodCode}, sysdate, #{categoryNum}, #{location}, #{qualityCode}, #{sellStatusCode})
